languages.text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.
languages.original_text:
Когда это существо атакует врага впервые за бой, враг совершает проверку Восприятия и в случае провала получает эффект {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}движутся как один{/g} на 1 раунд. Если враг успешно проходит проверку или если время действия эффекта {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}движутся как один{/g} истекло, то его больше нельзя применить к этому врагу.
Это существо всегда {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атак своих союзников.

traits.locale_text:
The first attack of any unit against an enemy places Coordinated Trap condition on the enemy for 1 round. Attacks by units allies against the enemy with Coordinated Trap deal attackers PER additional damage and have +AGI Bonus to crit chance.
All allies automatically dodge each others attacks.

Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, it inflicts the coordinated trap effect on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. While the effect lasts, when this creature's allies attack that target, it suffers +<u>attacker's PER</u>% more damage. The critical hit chance of those attacks is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.
The creature's allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks made by their allies.

Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, it inflicts the coordinated trap effect on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. While the effect lasts, when this creature's allies attack that target, it suffers +<u>attacker's PER</u>% more damage. The critical hit chance of those attacks is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.
The creature's allies automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks made by their allies.

Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.

Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.

Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.

languages.text:
Cuando esta criatura ataca a un enemigo por primera vez en combate, dicho enemigo debe realizar una prueba de Percepción. Si la falla, inflige el efecto {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Trampa coordinada{/g} en ese enemigo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si el enemigo supera la prueba o si concluye la duración de una {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Trampa coordinada{/g}, no puede volver a sufrir el efecto.
Esta criatura siempre {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} los ataques de sus aliados.
languages.original_text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando esta criatura ataca a un enemigo por primera vez en combate, dicho enemigo debe realizar una prueba de Percepción. Si la falla, inflige el efecto {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Trampa coordinada{/g} en ese enemigo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si el enemigo supera la prueba o si concluye la duración de una {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Trampa coordinada{/g}, no puede volver a sufrir el efecto.
Esta criatura siempre {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} los ataques de sus aliados.

languages.text:
戦闘においてこのクリーチャーが初めて敵を攻撃した際、その敵は認知力の判定を成功させなければならない。もし失敗した場合、{g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}連携トラップ{/g}の効果がその敵に対して１{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}適用される。 その敵が判定に成功した場合、または以前適用された{g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}連携トラップ{/g}の効果が終了した場合、その敵はそれ以上この効果を受けることはない。
このクリーチャーはいつも味方の攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘においてこのクリーチャーが初めて敵を攻撃した際、その敵は認知力の判定を成功させなければならない。もし失敗した場合、{g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}連携トラップ{/g}の効果がその敵に対して１{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}適用される。 その敵が判定に成功した場合、または以前適用された{g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}連携トラップ{/g}の効果が終了した場合、その敵はそれ以上この効果を受けることはない。
このクリーチャーはいつも味方の攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できる。

languages.text:
当此生物在战斗中首次攻击敌人时，被攻击的目标需要进行感知检定。若目标检定失败，则会受到{g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}协调陷阱{/g}效果影响，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}；若目标通过检定，或之前施加的{g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}协调陷阱{/g}效果结束，则目标不再会受到此效果影响。
此生物始终都会{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}由盟友发动的攻击。
languages.original_text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.

traits.locale_text:
当此生物在战斗中首次攻击敌人时，被攻击的目标需要进行感知检定。若目标检定失败，则会受到{g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}协调陷阱{/g}效果影响，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}；若目标通过检定，或之前施加的{g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}协调陷阱{/g}效果结束，则目标不再会受到此效果影响。
此生物始终都会{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}由盟友发动的攻击。

languages.text:
Wenn diese Kreatur zum ersten Mal im Kampf einen Feind angreift, muss dieser Feind eine Wahrnehmungsprobe bestehen. Wenn sie nicht bestanden wird, wird dieser Feind 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang mit dem Effekt {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Koordinierte Falle{/g} belegt. Wenn der Feind die Probe erfolgreich besteht oder die Dauer einer zuvor angewandten {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Koordinierten Falle{/g} endet, kann der Feind den Effekt nicht länger erleiden.
Es gelingt dieser Kreatur immer, Angriffen ihrer Verbündeten {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.

Wenn diese Kreatur zum ersten Mal im Kampf einen Feind angreift, muss dieser Feind eine Wahrnehmungsprobe bestehen. Wenn der Feind die Probe erfolgreich besteht oder die Dauer einer zuvor angewandten {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Koordinierten Falle{/g} endet, kann der Feind den Effekt nicht länger erleiden.
Es gelingt dieser Kreatur immer, Angriffen ihrer Verbündeten {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que cette créature attaque un ennemi pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, celui-ci doit réaliser un test de Perception. En cas d'échec, il subit l'effet {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Piège coordonné{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. En cas de réussite, ou si la durée d'un {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}Piège coordonné{/g} préexistant s'achève, cet effet ne peut plus lui être appliqué.
La créature {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} systématiquement les attaques de ses alliés.
languages.original_text:

If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.

La créature {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} systématiquement les attaques de ses alliés.

languages.text:
Когда это существо атакует врага впервые за бой, враг совершает проверку Восприятия и в случае провала получает эффект {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}движутся как один{/g} на 1 раунд. Если враг успешно проходит проверку или если время действия эффекта {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}движутся как один{/g} истекло, то его больше нельзя применить к этому врагу.
Это существо всегда {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атак своих союзников.
languages.original_text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, it inflicts the coordinated trap effect on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. While the effect lasts, when allies of this creature attack that target, it suffers +<u>attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of those attacks is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by their allies.

traits.locale_text:
Когда это существо атакует врага впервые за бой, эта атака накладывает на цель эффект "движутся как один" на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. На время действия эффекта, когда союзники существа атакуют ту же цель, она получает на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} атакующего</u>% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Шанс критического попадания{/g} этих атак увеличен на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u>%.
Это существо всегда {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атак своих союзников.

Когда это существо атакует врага впервые за бой, эта атака накладывает на цель эффект "движутся как один" на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. На время действия эффекта, когда союзники существа атакуют ту же цель, она получает на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} атакующего</u>% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Шанс критического попадания{/g} этих атак увеличен на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u>%.
Это существо всегда {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атак своих союзников.

languages.text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, it inflicts the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if enemy fails PER test. If enemy passed PER test or {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is over that enemy can't be affected {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect anymore.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by their allies.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, it inflicts the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if enemy fails PER test. If enemy passed PER test or {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is over that enemy can't be affected {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect anymore.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by their allies.

languages.text:
Bu yaratık, çatışmada ilk kez bir düşmana saldırdığında o düşman bir Algı testinden geçmelidir. Testi geçemezse düşman üzerinde {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}eş güdümlü tuzak{/g} etkisi oluşur. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Düşman, testi geçerse veya daha önce uygulanmış bir {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}eş güdümlü tuzak{/g} etkisinin süresi sona ererse artık o etkiye maruz kalamaz.
Bu yaratık, dost birimlerince yapılan saldırılardan her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever this creature attacks an enemy for the first time in combat, that enemy must make a Perception test. If failed, the {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} effect is inflicted on that enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If that enemy successfully passes the test or if the duration of a previously applied {g|f:7bb93df02d9942258b1acdb60e6eb3f7}coordinated trap{/g} ends, that enemy can no longer suffer the effect.
This creature always {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} attacks made by its allies.
